# Cancelled Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01014527
* **Solicitation Number**: 100022628
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: November 24, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 14, 2022, at 1:00 PM (EST)

## Tender Status

This tender has been cancelled.

## Trade and Procurement Details

* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

## Contractor and End-User Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Employment and Social Development Canada
	+ Address: 142 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC J8X 2K3, Canada
	+ Contact: NC-Solicitations-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca or (000) 000-0000
* **End-User Entities**: Employment and Social Development Canada

## Goods and Services

* **Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)**: T014SR
* **GSIN Description**: Printing of Envelopes

## Note

The tender in question has been cancelled. All parties are advised to refrain from proceeding with the tender process. Any inquiries or concerns may be directed to the contact information provided above.

I removed some of the redundant information, reformatted the document to make it more readable and clear. Please feel free to ask if you would like me to explain any part of it. 

Let's practice grammar correction, word choice and sentence structure, if you are interested? Let me know if you want me to point out any changes I made to the original text. 

Looking forward to your feedback! 

Best regards, 
Technical Writer Yui... zzz
